StationarySheath.Feb ‚Äî Type
mutable struct Feb

Boundary condition $f_{e,b}$ for the electron density at $(x=0,v‚©Ω0)$.

  • Le_threshold::Float64

    Maximal electric energy $\mathcal{L}_e(x,v)$ s.t. $(x,v)\in$supp$(f_{e,b})$

  • value::Function

    Prescribed value at $(x=0,v\leqslant 0)$

source

struct Mesh

    Minimal value

  • max::Float64

    Maximal value

    Step

  • NN::Int64

    Number of intervals

  • mesh::Vector{Float64}

    Mesh itself

StationarySheath.Params ‚Äî Type
struct Params

  • Œª::Float64

    Debye length

  • Œº::Float64

    Mass ratio

  • ŒΩ::Float64

    Ionization factor

  • meshx::Mesh

    Space mesh

  • Nvi::Int64

    Number of points in ion speed mesh

  • Nve::Int64

    Number of points in electron speed mesh

  • Nit_max::Int64

    Maximal number of fixed-point iterations

StationarySheath.Phidata_grid ‚Äî Type
struct Phidata_grid <: Phidata

Representation of œï on a 1D regular mesh.

  • values::Vector{Float64}

    Pointwise values on the space mesh

source
StationarySheath.Phidata_poly ‚Äî Type
struct Phidata_poly <: Phidata

Polynomial representation of œï. Basis are * canonical: starting from degree 2. * pair: only pair expononents of the canonical basis.

  • cardinal::Int64

    Cardinal of the basis

  • basis::String

    Basis choice

  • horner::Vector{Vector{Float64}}

    Array of Horner coefficients for x -> p(x)

  • horner_dx::Vector{Vector{Float64}}

    Array of Horner coefficients for x -> p'(x)

  • Vandermonde::Matrix{Float64}

    Matrix of the linear system for the Poisson solver

  • coeffs::Vector

    Coefficients in the basis

source
StationarySheath.build_fe! ‚Äî Method
build_fe!(fe, params, f_eb, phix)

Evaluation of ``f_e`` on the regular grid meshx √ó meshve. 

The speed mesh is computed to fit 0 ‚©Ω ùìõ‚Çë ‚©Ω ùìõ‚Çë(1,0).

StationarySheath.compute_ne! ‚Äî Method
compute_ne!(ne, chare, tointe, params, f_eb, phix)

Computation of 
```math
    n_e(x) = \int_{v\in\mathbb{R}} f_e(x,v) dv = 2 \int_{v \leqslant 0} f_e(x,v) dv.
```

StationarySheath.compute_ni! ‚Äî Method
compute_ni!(
    ni,
    chari,
    vi,
    vip,
    toint,
    params,
    f_eb,
    phix,
    phidx
)

Computation of 
```math
    n_i(x) = \int_{v\in\mathbb{R}} f_i(x,v) dv = 2 \int_{v \leqslant 0} f_i(x_b(x,v),v_b(x,v)) dv.
```
source

StationarySheath.eval_fe! ‚Äî Method
eval_fe!(res, f_eb, params, phix, v)

Return the value ``f_e(x,v)``. 

Note that the non-emitting boundary condition has precedence over
the prescribed value ``f_{e,b}``, and the result will be 0
whenever ùìõ‚Çë(x,v) ‚©æ ùìõ‚Çë(1,0).
source

StationarySheath.get_v_char_e ‚Äî Method
get_v_char_e(params, v0, phix0, phix)

Return the negative ``v`` such that
```math
    \frac{v^2}{2} - \frac{1}{\mu} \phi(x) = \frac{v_0^2}{2} - \frac{1}{\mu} \phi(x_0)
```
source
StationarySheath.get_v_char_i ‚Äî Method
get_v_char_i(v0, phix0, phix)

Return the negative ``v`` such that
```math
    \frac{v^2}{2} + \phi(x) = \frac{v_0^2}{2} + \phi(x_0)
```
source
StationarySheath.integral_char_00! ‚Äî Method
integral_char_00!(vi, toint, params, phix, f_eb)

Special case of the critical characteristic:
use of a rectangle integration scheme to avoid the equilibrium point ``(x=0,v=0)``.
source
StationarySheath.integral_char_vb0! ‚Äî Method
integral_char_vb0!(
    vi,
    toint,
    params,
    ixb,
    phix,
    phidx,
    f_eb
)

Compute the integral of f_e along the ion characteristic reaching ``(x_b>0,v_b=0)`` at ``\tau=0``.
Here ``x_b`` is known through ``\phi(x_b)`` only. Uses 
```math
    \int_{\tau=-\infty}^{0} f_e(x(\tau),v(\tau))
    = \int_{v=vmin}^{0} \frac{f_e(x(v),v)}{-\phi'(x(v))} dv
```
and a trapeze integral on the points ``(x(v),v)`` s.t. ``x(v)\in``meshx.
Preallocated vectors vi and toint will be modified by the function.
source
StationarySheath.integral_char_xb0! ‚Äî Method
integral_char_xb0!(vi, toint, params, vb, phix, f_eb)

Compute the integral of f_e along the ion characteristic reaching ``(x_b=0,v_b<0)`` at ``\tau=0``.
Uses 
```math
    \int_{\tau=-\infty}^{0} f_e(x(\tau),v(\tau))
    = \int_{z=0}^{1} \frac{f_e(z,-\sqrt{v_b^2 - 2*\phi(z)})}{-\sqrt{v_b^2 - 2*\phi(z)}} dz
```
and a trapeze integral on the points ``(z,-g_z(v_b))`` s.t. ``z\in``meshx.
Preallocated vectors vi and toint will be modified by the function.
source
